mapper.select:
select id as userId ,name as username ,email as email ,date_format(str_to_date(birth,'%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') as birth ,phone as phone ,join_date as joinDate ,upt_dt as uptDt from user_info where 1=1
and id = #{id}
select count(*) as cnt from user_info where id = #{newID}

select a.id as userId ,a.name as username ,SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.email,'@',1) as emailId ,concat('@', SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.email,'@',-1)) as emailAddr ,concat('@', SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.email,'@',-1)) as txtEmailAddr ,SUBSTR(a.birth,1,4) as year ,SUBSTR(a.birth,5,2) as month ,SUBSTR(a.birth,7,2) as day ,SUBSTR(a.phone,1,3) as serial ,SUBSTR(a.phone,4,4) as phoneNum1 ,SUBSTR(a.phone,8,4) as phoneNum2 ,a.join_date as joinDate ,a.role as userRole ,a.upt_dt ,convert(ifnull(DATEDIFF(sysdate(), a.upt_dt), 0), char) as lastupdatediff ,ifnull(b.storedFileNm,'-') as fileNm from user_info a left outer join tb_file_mng b on a.id = b.refKey and b.refWord = 'USER' where 1=1
and a.id = #{userId}
select date_format(CONNECT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') as CONNECT_DT ,ID ,count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where 1=1 and LOG_TYPE = 'LOGIN' group by ID, date_format(CONNECT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d')

with temp1 as ( select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') as DT, count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where DATE_FORMAT(CONNECT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and ID = #{userId} union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -5 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') as DT, count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where DATE_FORMAT(CONNECT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -5 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and ID = #{userId} union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -4 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') as DT, count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where DATE_FORMAT(CONNECT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -4 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and ID = #{userId} union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') as DT, count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where DATE_FORMAT(CONNECT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and ID = #{userId} union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') as DT, count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where DATE_FORMAT(CONNECT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and ID = #{userId} union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') as DT, count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where DATE_FORMAT(CONNECT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') and ID = #{userId} union all select DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') as DT, count(*) as CNT from user_connect_log_history where DATE_FORMAT(CONNECT_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and ID = #{userId} ), temp2 as ( select DT, CNT, dayofweek(STR_TO_DATE(replace(DT,'-',''), '%Y%m%d%'))-1 as DAYCODE from temp1 ) select DT, CNT, DAYCODE from temp2 order by DT
